original_text: And we declare unto you glad tidings, how that the promise which was made unto the fathers,
korean_text: 우리도 조상들에게 주신 약속을 너희에게 전파하노니

sentences.original_text: And we declare unto you glad tidings,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 너희에게 기쁜 소식을 전하노라,

sentences.original_text: which was made unto the fathers,
